account.note: Indie author @ amazon.com/author/sydneyfalk  with a pretty rusty tech background, who's also trying to build robot babies. (Yes, I know I'm fucked in the head.)

content:
My best options so far:

* Garry's Mod (have to learn even more, but could definitely build 3D settings, implement rules and such, and even have the chance of animated models in the future, if I wanted to get hoity and/or toity)

* Tabletop Simulator (but I'm gonna need to learn a lot, and I don't think I can implement any actual game mechanics)

* Fantasy Grounds (already has mechanics I can pull in, so less learning -- but 3D's never gonna be part of it, I don't think)

Options, at least. ^_^
